name: SciSpace Agent
tagline: Only AI agent automating research with 150+ academic tools
description: SciSpace Agent, your Co-Scientist, unites hundreds of academic tools and databases in one platform. With a single prompt, it reads literature, analyzes data, drafts papers, cutting 90% of research time and accelerating your path from hypothesis to discovery

name: Spill
tagline: Minimalist freewriting app
description: Spill is a minimalist freewriting app to spill your thoughts out in a distraction-free space. Once you're done, you get to reflect deeply on your thoughts with our voice mode. Start writing better today.

name: Verbite
tagline: SEO-ready content from AI Agents
description: Generic AI tools give you drafts. Verbite delivers publish-ready, high-ranking content thanks to specialized AI Agents.

name: Kanbanq : Open alpha
tagline: Project management. Simply done. For small teams & indies
description: A fast, minimal project management tool for devs, designers and small teams. Built-in AI helps break down tasks, summarise sprints and organise your backlog â€“ no clutter, no plugins, no fluff. Just clean, focused planning that works.

name: Ghost 6.0
tagline: The open source product that generates $100M+ for creators
description: Networked publishing with ActivityPub, deeply integrated native analytics, a huge number of improvements, and $100M+ earned by indie publishers. Our biggest-ever release. The most exciting thing on PH today that has nothing to do with AI. Probably.

name: Rollups
tagline: Take control of your startup's equity
description: Rollups.com helps startups take control of their equity Roll Up Vehicles (RUVs): Raise capital from many investors through a single entity Consolidation Vehicles (CVs): Consolidate existing stakeholders into a vehicle while preserving their QSBS eligibility

name: PromptPlex
tagline: The command center for all your AI prompts
description: Stop losing great prompts. PromptPlex is the ultimate toolkit to master your AI workflow. Build a powerful, searchable library with smart folders and dynamic variables for ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini & more. Your AI command center is here.

name: Sailhouse - Agent Control Plane
tagline: Let's be honest. Your AI agents could be better.
description: Sailhouse is the control plane for AI agents and async systems. Define dynamic workflows in code that respond to events and data. Get reliable delivery, real-time visibility, and production-grade coordination, without heavyweight infra.

name: ClueoAPI
tagline: The missing personality layer for every AI product.
description: Give your AI a voice worth listening to. ClueoAPI lets you inject personality, emotion, and tone into LLMs, making every response feel real, human, and aligned with your brandâ€”one API call. Infinite character.

name: Sellible
tagline: The sales gym for founders
description: Build your sales muscle. Sellible lets you role-play real sales conversations with AI buyers, so you can practice, mess up, and master objections without burning real leads. Get your reps in.

name: Poe API
tagline: One API for all the best AI models
description: Poe's new API offers a single, OpenAI-compatible interface to access and switch between top-tier text, image, video, and audio models like Claude, Imagen 4, and Veo 3. All through one API key and billing system.

name: Tenki Cloud
tagline: GitHub actions. 90% cheaper. 30% faster. 2-clicks migration.
description: Accelerate your CI with Tenki Cloud, a GitHub runners alternative that is 90% cheaper and 30% faster. Migrate in under 2 minutes, and let our Autoscale Runner take care of scaling so you can focus on building.

name: Clado Atlas
tagline: The ground-truth platform for humans
description: Search 800M+ profiles with AI. Find anyone by skills, experience, education, and more. The most powerful people search engine.

name: Zealock
tagline: The whatsapp marketplace that runs itself
description: Unlock commerce through the worldâ€™s most popular messaging app. Buyers browse. Sellers upload. We handle the rest, all through a simple chat. Coming soon on X, Telegram and Instagram.

name: Tregno
tagline: The World's first AI content operating system
description: Tregno is the World's first AI content platform that doesn't just write, it builds and executes a complete SEO strategy for you. Go from a single keyword to a fully optimized, publish-ready blog post in minutes, not weeks.

name: VSCO Capture
tagline: Standalone camera app for iphone with filters
description: Take photos with real-time iconic VSCO camera filters, adjust manual controls, & apply camera effects with the standalone VSCO Capture camera app for iPhone.

name: Golpo
tagline: The most powerful AI video generator for explainer videos
description: Golpo is the most powerful AI video generator for explainer videos. Through its custom-trained video gen engine, Golpo turns your documents and internal workflows into fully produced, customizable explainer videos. Try at https://video.golpoai.com/

name: Hierarchical Reasoning Model
tagline: Brain-inspired, multi-level reasoning & planning AI model
description: A revolutionary 27M-parameter AI model that performs complex sequential reasoning in a single forward pass. Featuring dual recurrent modules for high level planning and sharp detail, it outperforms larger models on puzzles and maze challenges.

name: CriticAI
tagline: AI-powered music analysis for A&R teams, artists, etc.
description: CriticAI is the first AI-powered music analysis tool designed for A&R teams and artists to provide quick, unbiased song-related insights.

name: LiquidTimers
tagline: Visual pomodoro timer with drag & drop simplicity
description: Liquid Timer is a modern timer and focus app designed for power users, students, and creatives. Easily drag a timer from the menu bar to your desktop, set unlimited circular timers, and watch as vibrant liquid animations show time draining away.
